argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lmod1.m | |- M = ( { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , { I } >. , <. ( +g ` ndx ) , { <. <. I , I >. , I >. } >. , <. ( Scalar ` ndx ) , R >. } u. { <. ( .s ` ndx ) , ( x e. ( Base ` R ) , y e. { I } |-> y ) >. } ) |
| 2 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` R ) e. _V |
| 3 |  | #P_snex | |- { I } e. _V |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( ( Base ` R ) e. _V /\ { I } e. _V ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( ( Base ` R ) e. _V /\ { I } e. _V ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_mpt2exga | |- ( ( ( Base ` R ) e. _V /\ { I } e. _V ) -> ( x e. ( Base ` R ) , y e. { I } |-> y ) e. _V ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_lmodvsca | |- ( ( x e. ( Base ` R ) , y e. { I } |-> y ) e. _V -> ( x e. ( Base ` R ) , y e. { I } |-> y ) = ( .s ` M ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_3syl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( x e. ( Base ` R ) , y e. { I } |-> y ) = ( .s ` M ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( .s ` M ) = ( x e. ( Base ` R ) , y e. { I } |-> y ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( x = ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) /\ y = I ) ) -> y = I ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_lmodsca | |- ( R e. Ring -> R = ( Scalar ` M ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> R = ( Scalar ` M ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Scalar ` M ) = R ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) = ( 1r ` R ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 19 | 14, 18 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_snidg | |- ( I e. V -> I e. { I } ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> I e. { I } ) |
| 22 | 9, 10, 19, 21, 21 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( ( 1r ` ( Scalar ` M ) ) ( .s ` M ) I ) = I ) |
